article.title: Northrop Awarded Hawkeye Full Rate Production Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Bethpage, N.Y., is being awarded an $113,723,443 advance acquisition contract with fixed-price line items for long lead materials and related support for the full rate production of five E-2D Advanced Hawkeye Lot 2 aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting.
